value:
Have you seen Louise in her bridal
attire? She's somehow managed to
shine more brilliantly than usual!

I'd rather help those in need than be
lionized as a Mage General. That's my
greatest wish.

You know, I have an apprentice
named Erk. I wonder what he'd say if
he saw Louise and me like this...

Times like these truly underscore the
importance of peace.

Protecting Louise until the end...
That's my mission, I feel.

I am Pent, Mage General of Etruria.
I've come regarding a festival invite
from $Nf.

Louise, my power exists so
I may protect you.

It seems I've hit my stride.
Do these clothes...help?

I can't look Louise in the
eye with results like this...

I can feel my power grow.
Please, accept my thanks.

I am Pent, Mage General of Etruria.
This outfit...makes me a bit anxious.

Over their years, people tend to find
value in all manner of things.$k$pPerhaps a legendary sword or tome
for one—or the power of influence
and position for another.$k$pIn my case, the most valuable thing
I have, without question, is my wife,
Louise.$k$pI must become stronger to protect
her, for she deserves only kindness
and affection in her life.$k$pIf you look, I'm sure you'll find the
same for yourself... Something you
value above all else, I mean.
それっ！
さて
うああっ！
弱ったね…
True love never dies.
For my lovely wife!
Thanks for coming!
A happy occasion indeed!
Louise... I'm sorry...
Hahaha
Pleased to be a groom, that's me.
Oh? Are you offering your blessing? Many thanks!
Of course it's just for the festival, but dressing like this makes it feel like the real thing.
My wife is an honest and gentle person. I admire her.
Abandoning my position... Living on the run with Louise... It wouldn't be a bad life.
Well then, I mustn't leave my lovely bride waiting...
You've shown me quite the wonderful time. From the bottom of my heart, I thank you.
Ah! Right.
I do.
For better or worse.
